description: This table contains data on intervention (LPI) records associated with a patient.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the intervention record.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name for this intervention.

columns.name: INTRV_TYPE_ID_INTRVNTN_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the intervention type.

columns.name: INTRV_TYPE_CONTACT
columns.description: The intervention type contact for this intervention.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this intervention. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.
